pullRequest.body:
We had duplicated API between topological spaces and uniform spaces.
In this PR I mostly deduplicate it with some exceptions:

- `SeparationQuotient.lift'` and `SeparationQuotient.map`
  are leftovers from the old version
  that are designed to work with uniform spaces;
- probably, some theorems/instances still assume `UniformSpace`
  when `TopologicalSpace` would work.

Outside of `UniformSpace/Separation`, I mostly changed `SeparatedSpace` to `T0Space`
and `separationRel` to `Inseparable`. I also rewrote a few proofs that were broken by the API change.

Fixes #2031

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
-->
- [x] depends on: #10871

This PR/issue depends on:
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#10871~~
By **[Dependent Issues](https://github.com/z0al/dependent-issues)** (🤖). Happy coding!
<!-- By Dependent Issues (Action) - DO NOT REMOVE -->

Thanks a lot!

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8224331188/job/22488019211)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8224331188/job/22488019071)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8224331188/job/22488019171)
Thanks a lot for all this work! I think I've looked at everything but it would be nice to get another look by someone else, maybe @PatrickMassot ?
I can never remember, are the aligns supposed to stay in their original files?
IMHO, moving to a file that is imported by the original file should be OK.
I was thinking of a potential issue with mathport, but I've looked at older discussions and it should be fine (I could have guessed actually, we've been moving aligns regularly...)

```suggestion
instance (priority := 100) _root_.MetricSpace.instT0Space : T0Space γ where
```

```suggestion
instance (priority := 100) EMetricSpace.instT0Space : T0Space γ where
```

```suggestion
    surjective_mk.forall₂.2 dist_edist
```
Again, not sure about moving the `#align`
Same argument as above: anyone who imports the old location gets the new instance.

```suggestion
  · refine induction_on a
```
Could you update the module docstring of this file?
Really the whole module docstring needs to be updated. And I’m not sure where we currently find that for uniform space being T0 is equivalent to being T2.
I'll rewrite the module docstring tonight or tomorrow. Typeclass inference now can prove `[T0Space X] [R1Space X] : T2Space X`. Do you want me to add it as an `Iff` lemma?
AFAICT you no longer state anything in terms of `(𝓤 α).ker`. I'm not sure how useful it is, but for the sake of conservatism could you add a version of `t0Space_iff_uniformity` in these terms?
Done.
Maybe we should align this to `Filter.HasBasis.inseparable_iff_uniformity`?

```suggestion
#align id_rel_sub_separation_relation Inseparable.rfl
```
?
Aren’t we loosing some mathematical content here?
I think the new `group_inseparable_iff` takes care of that.
Ok great. I looked for it but couldn’t find it.
Shouldn’t we rename that theorem?
Done.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - refactor(UniformSpace): drop `separationRel`

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - refactor(UniformSpace): change the definition
